descriptionHtml:
I felt Skyrim lacked some sort of commical looking follower. So I took it upon myself to make someone we all know, Garfield. Although he may lack his fatness, laziness and eating habits, hes tiny, cat like, orange, and has an inventory mostly of foods and food related items like Garfield would have! He\'s level 35, and has a pretty good amount of health. He\'s dressed mainly as a chef but if you give him armor he will probably equip them like toher followers do. Hope you enjoy!

Where to find him: Bannered Mare in Whiterun around the fire.

Gliches/notes: I set him to be orange but for some reason his head remains gray even though its orange in creation kit, so sorry about that, and sometimes his hands turn red. I\'ll try to fix that but then again I don\'t know if it\'s just my game glitching or the mod. So let me know if it acts different for you.
And if you see him sitting in a chair(actually in the chair) its because he\'s acting like he\'s sitting in the chair but since he\'s so small he kinda goes underneath it.
He is a Khajiit and sounds like a normal one, I would change his voice to sound more like garfields but I don\'t know how to do that so if iever learn i\'ll deffinatly add that in.
This mod is also in the steam workshop under the same title as this one.
author: SPARTAN NICK004
